akn:section.akn:heading: Cadet applicants; preappointment travel to Academy

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1926. Cadet applicants; preappointment travel to Academy The Secretary is authorized to expend appropriated funds for selective preappointment travel to the Academy for orientation visits of cadet applicants. (Added Pub. L. 98–557, § 24(a), Oct. 30, 1984, 98 Stat. 2872, § 181a; renumbered § 1926, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 110(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4212.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2018—Pub. L. 115–282 renumbered section 181a of this title as this section.
